page.title: 18A Day in My Life in Ingleton
page.content: When I arrived home I had my tea which was egg, chips and baked beans. I played out after tea playing football. We play in a gap between the houses where there are no windows to break! I came in home at about 7.00pm. I played in the sitting room with my remote controlled tank. At 8.00pm I started to prepare for bed, I cleaned my teeth and put on my pyjamas. I watched a programme on the black and white television set in my bedroom. The television belongs to me and my two sisters. At about 9.30pm I switched off the television and put out my light. It was about half an hour before I fell asleep.
